product_name: Marmot Mavericks 40 Semi-Rectangular Sleeping Bag - Kids'
long_description: Tuck your kiddo into this easy-to-love, hoodless sleeper for a good night of rest. Perfect for family-campground living in spring and summer, this bag features a pillow pocket for at-home comfort.
